author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Because regulated industries—like aerospace, robotics, and manufacturing—need confidence, stability, and governance. OpenUSD is stepping up with a suite of specs that ensure consistency, interoperability, and long-term value.

Guy Martin breaks it down in this conversation. Watch the clip, then catch the full interview for all the details. https://hubs.la/Q03gNSxJ0
title: Why push OpenUSD through international standards bodies when it’s already open source?
